message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on this amazing product. I'm willing to sell it to you for $6,500.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $5,500. Can you meet me halfway?

I understand that $5,500 is a good price for you, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get closer to the value of the product. I'm offering it to you for $6,800.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $6,200?

I understand that you're still a bit above your budget, but I'm not willing to go down to $6,200. I'm willing to compromise a bit more, but I need to get closer to the value of the product. I'm offering it to you for $6,600.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $6,400?

I understand that you're still a bit above your budget, but I'm not willing to go down to $6,400. I'm willing to make one more compromise, but I need to get closer to the value of the product. I'm offering it to you for $6,800.
I'm not willing to go back up to $6,800. I think we're getting close, but I'd like to try to get it down to $6,500 again. Can you meet me there?

I understand that you're trying to get the price down, but I'm not willing to go back to $6,500. I'm willing to make one more compromise, but I need to get closer to the value of the product. I'm offering it to you for $6,900.
I'm not willing to go up to $6,900. I think we're getting close, but I'd like to try to get it down to $6,700. Can you meet me there?
